intent_template: Find me the cheapest {{item}} {{condition}} and add one of any size to my shopping cart.
intent: Find me the cheapest shoe with a multi-colored word printed on it and add one of any size to my shopping cart.

instantiation_dict.condition: with a multi-colored word printed on it

must_include: SWEETSHOPZ Hummingbird Geometric Holographic Color White Active Running Walking Sneakers Shoes for Women Men Unisex Kids Adults Fashion Sports
